CustomField.formula: ((Sale_Price__c + Corp_Car_Total_Cost__c + Hotel_Total_Cost__c + Transfers_COst__c ) - (Air_Tickets_Nett__c + Corp_Car_Driveaway_Nett__c + Hotel_Nett__c + Transfers_Nett__c ))/ (Sale_Price__c + Corp_Car_Total_Cost__c + Hotel_Total_Cost__c + Transfers_COst__c )
CustomField.label: Combined Margin(%)
